new_triples_.Used_text: Standard charge is performed at a C rate of  0.   .   The charge consists of a constant current (CC) charge to  4.        V , followed by a constant voltage (CV) charge until the current tapers to  ≤0.0        .

new_triples_.Used_text: Nominal capacity is stated as 'Nominal capacity  标准充电后，'

new_triples_.Used_text: Keep batteries in a icebox with ambient temperature of  - 4° C for 4 hours.

new_triples_.Used_text: The cell shall be standard CH
new_triples_.head: The cell

new_triples_.Used_text: The cell shall be standard charged.
new_triples_.head: cell

new_triples_.Used_text: The cell shall be charged for 24 hours using 10 V, 2200 mAh power supply.
new_triples_.head: Charging operation

new_triples_.Used_text: The cell shall be standard charged, and discharged with a resistor load for a certain period.
new_triples_.head: The cell

new_triples_.Used_text: The force for the crushing is to be applied by a hydraulic ram with a diameter of "["["str", "[""\

new_triples_.Used_text: The cell has a mass of 16 kN.
new_triples_.head: LiOnCell

new_triples_.Used_text: Use dedicated charger.
new_triples_.head: Use dedicated charger.

new_triples_.Used_text: Don’t immerse, throw, wet the battery in water / seawater.
new_triples_.head: immersing

new_triples_.Used_text: Don’t put the battery into a microwave oven, dryer or high -pressure container.
new_triples_.head: Lithium Ion Battery
new_triples_.tail: not put into a microwave oven, dryer or high -pressure container

new_triples_.Used_text: Don’t use or assemble the battery with other makers’ batteries, different types and / or models of batteries such as dry batteries, nickel -metal hydride batteries, or nickel - cadium batteries.
new_triples_.head: Lithium Ion Battery
new_triples_.tail: not use or assemble with other makers’ batteries, different types and / or models of batteries such as dry batteries, nickel -metal hydride batteries, or nickel - cadium batteries

new_triples_.Used_text: Don’t use or assemble old and new batteries together.
new_triples_.head: Lithium Ion Battery
new_triples_.tail: not use or assemble old and new batteries together

new_triples_.Used_text: If charging does not complete within the specified time, stop.
new_triples_.head: Lithium Ion Battery
new_triples_.tail: if charging does not complete within the specified time, stop

new_triples_.Used_text: HasManufacturer
new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell

new_triples_.Used_text: Battery must be charged with constant current -constant voltage (CC-CV).
new_triples_.head: ChargingMethod

new_triples_.Used_text: Before using the battery
new_triples_.head: Before using the battery

new_triples_.Used_text: Replace the battery when using time of battery becomes shorter than usual.
new_triples_.head: Replacement Guidelines
new_triples_.tail: Replace the battery when using time of battery becomes shorter than usual.

new_triples_.Used_text: If the battery is needed to be stored for a long period, battery should be removed from the application and stored in a place where humidity and temperature are low.
new_triples_.head: storage

new_triples_.Used_text: To prevent the deterioration of the battery performance caused by heat
new_triples_.head: Battery
new_triples_.tail: away from the area where heat is generated
